distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for xorg-x11-libXdmcp fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2017-2625: The generation of session key in XDM using libXdmcp might have used weak entropy, making
  the session keys predictable (bsc#1025046)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: It was discovered that libXdmcp before 1.1.2 including used weak entropy to generate session keys. On a multi-user system using xdmcp, a local attacker could potentially use information available from the process list to brute force the key, allowing them to hijack other users' sessions.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
